channel.title: Help
channel.description: um how can i make java handle 2 servers at once running off my comp and how can i let the owner access the server files from his comp cause his charger is fed up and i am hosting for him and i need to know if he can get into the server files and add stuff to shops and shit.

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @iloverock iloverock
item.description:
@iloverock wrote:

Your “2 servers at once” problem is easily resolved, for instance, make server #1 listen at port 5555 and server #2 listen at port 43594. you can also use the same IP address for this.if you have any extra questions feel free to pm me about it

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @stewie0888 stewie0888
item.description:
@stewie0888 wrote:

you need remote desktop connection RDC. Should come installed with some OS’s. Vista does I know… but teamviewer might work

Read full topic
